body: You can use a hack like this. It's originally designed to only set up certain radiance parameters not including g and ac. I haven't tested this but it should work. Let me know if it doesn't. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/tJGoy4W-urVRXCDQaYdaPQmIkKS90SW1sVw2OYlKNh4K1MamPiupki*1zAv5ZJUvVxVsknaz*TXEgxNKLS9Zf9jI7jWW*fr8/additionalParameters.png)
